content: Create comprehensive weather service architecture with multiple data sources (NOAA, Weather.gov, OpenWeather)
Implement automated lesson rescheduling system based on weather thresholds and safety conditions
Build safety alert system for dangerous conditions (avalanche, extreme weather, visibility)
Create slope condition tracking and reporting with live updates from multiple sources
Implement weather-based pricing adjustments and demand prediction algorithms
Build historical weather analysis system for seasonal planning and trends
Integrate with calendar system for automatic weather-based notifications
Create emergency weather protocols and communication systems
Build comprehensive backend API with weather data aggregation and ML predictions
Create frontend dashboard for weather monitoring and management
